data.text:
The Black Vampire (1953)

by Roman Viñoly Barreto

Flicker Alley – November 2, 2022

Bruno's recce

Film Noir is a major genre of cinema and when it is Argentinian, almost unknown and from the 50s, it can only be seen given the quality of the two Argentinian films already released by the publisher.

Original Title :

Audio: Français

Subtitles : Français

Duration : 1h30

Format : Blu Ray / US import

Area : A

Genre : Drama, Horror

Synopsis

This clever "feminist" reworking of Fritz Lang's classic M focuses on the mothers of children stalked by a deranged pedophile.
